title: Happy New Year 2021, Childhood Memories, WTF, Right or Wrong and more.
itunes:title: Happy New Year 2021, Childhood Memories, WTF, Right or Wrong and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! This is a very special intro because it is a concert just for you!!! Happy New Year 2021. Steve goes down memory lane and shares with us his fondest childhood memories. The fellas tell us the things that you hear that will make you say WTF! Nephew Tommy's stupidity and ignoracity is evident as we get the first Right or Wrong of the New Year. In Comedy Roulette, the focal point is speaker phone. Junior cannot understand why a human being would call someone before 8am on a Saturday morning as he gives us Truth Be Told. Fool #2 murders another one in the spirit of Khalid. Dave Chappelle's 8:46 is one of YouTube's Top Trending Videos. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about the book The Magic of Thinking Big. Happy New Year and have a great weekend!!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
